# sakura_simple_notification_group (Data Source)

Get information about an existing SimpleNotification Group.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (String) The ID of the SimpleNotification Group.
- `name` (String) The name of the SimpleNotification Group.
- `tags` (Set of String) The tags of the SimpleNotification Group.

### Read-Only

- `description` (String) The description of the SimpleNotification Group.
- `destinations` (List of String) The destinations of the SimpleNotification Group.
